Title: Je trouve que il faut faire attention à…
Reply: Bonjour Francis,La Banque de France fixe le taux de l'usure à partir des taux effectifs moyens pratiqués par les établissements de crédit, augmentés d’un tiers. Ainsi, le taux de l’usure correspond au taux maximum légal que les établissements de crédit (comme Cofidis) sont autorisés à pratiquer lorsqu’ils accordent un crédit. Ce taux varie en fonction du type de prêts. Il est fixé à la fin de chaque trimestre pour le trimestre suivant par la Banque de France et publié au Journal officiel. A bientôt. Céline de l'équipe Cofidis. 😉

However there is no way to validate the transfer in the application. So you have to ask the AI for help, who eventually connects you with a service advisor. I was connected to 'Sarah Conseiller 76' who was unable to help, and told me I have to wait another 48 hours to speak with an advisor who can validate the payment. When I questioned why, she ended the conversation by disconnecting me. A highly questionable way to deal with customers.

Title: I chose Orange Bank because they were free
Reply: Bonjour Jon Jeremy,Je vous remercie de votre avis et je suis désolé de ces événements.Pour information, pendant le changement de partenaire bancaire (Visa vers Mastercard) nous avons automatiquement envoyé la nouvelle carte à l'adresse renseignée sur votre compte bancaire.Si votre nom/prénom n'étaient pas affichés sur la boîte aux lettres ou si vous avez déménagé sans nous signaler votre nouvelle adresse : la carte ne peut pas être livrée.Bonne journée,Tom.
Experience: I chose Orange Bank because they were freeI chose Orange Bank because they were freeNow I cannot make any withdrawal or payment because I HAVE NO CARD!This happened with the switch to Mastercard.Everything was ok with VISA, except not being a "real" bank I often cannot pay at certain places - it is a "charge" card.But they did not send the new Mastercard to my old address. I updated my address via the App, and orderd another card for 10 €.It has been 3 weeks, and STILL NO CARD!I have tried for help via the only chat and just go round in circles! I raise support requests via the App and they get closed with no action!So for that I AM LEAVING ORANGE BANK for AXA BANK.

Title: Terrible in virtually every way (yes as…
Reply: Bonjour Josh Casey,Nous sommes désolés pour ce retour d’expérience, qui, à priori ne vous a pas satisfait. En effet, notre application peut être touchée par des dysfonctionnements, qui sont en général résolus dans la journée. Effectivement, nos cartes ont des plafonds de paiement et de retrait selon l'offre choisie. Il est possible de faire une demande d'augmentation de ces plafonds. Vous restez Maître de vos demandes et de votre application.Pour ce qui concerne le fait que nous ne sommes joignables, il fait suite à la crise sanitaire, nous avons dû réorganiser notre service et notre ligne est dédiée à nos clients Premium.Nous vous invitons, à nous contacter sur webmaster@orangebank.fr nous pourrons vous assister dans vos demandes.Bonne journée.L'équipe Orange Bank.
Experience: Terrible in virtually every way (yes as…Terrible in virtually every way (yes as people say they have a nice looking app), which will not help when it comes to the inevitable issues. Very low withdrawal limits which can not be raised (they say in reply below that they can - but the requests are denied for no reason with no explanation and no way to change it, very low limits, imagine being outside France and this being your only source of money if something went wrong, no way to call to increase the limit, even in France there are no branches so no way round this). Impossible security. No way to contact them (except sending 500 max character messages for very urgent matters that get automatic refusal responses days later). Instant chat customer service can not actually do anything and are extremely rude and short with you, actually cutting-off conversations mid way. Constant glitches and app/website issues, often can't complete a simple procedure for many days (and of course there is no branch to go to or way to phone them). No way to use it on a computer without your phone. If you can not walk into the bank - you need better than this to rely on for your main account. Can't imagine anyone risking this as their main or only account, you know for sure at some point things will go terribly wrong. If you plan on using it as a backup account for some simple things it might be ok, I would never trust them for anything significant. The online idea is a good one, but they totally missed the target with this, it can only survive here because the competition is so terrible and expensive in France.

Title: Arnaque / Mauvaise fois à la clôture de banque
Reply: No Reply
Experience: Arnaque / Mauvaise fois à la clôture de banqueBeware when closing your bank account at Boursorama ! They will suggest you to instead just "suspend" it so it can be easily reactivated later and so you can get notified in case of direct debit attempt on your account. But where they stick it to you is when they bill you for these direct debit requests (that are refused anyway), something that cannot happen on a definitely closed account And obviously, if you need to close your account for good you will have to pay these fees... Bad faith/theft

Title: The Boursorama customer service is going down the drain
Reply: No Reply
Experience: The Boursorama customer service is going down the drainI used to be very satisfied with this online bank and I have been a client of Boursorama for many years, but recently, the quality of the service has seriously deteriorated. I need to make an urgent bank transfer abroad. For security reasons, Boursorama has blocked the various bank transfer requests I made online. Consequently, I sent them an email through their portal asking for support, so the transfer could be made. While I got a notification acknowledging that my email had been received and that I will receive a confirmation to my email address, I never received such a confirmation. Furthermore, when I check on their website the history of my requests, I can see that the email request that I sent to them does not appear. I have tried to call the customer service several times and each time I got connected to a completely useless robot. As a last resort, I have requested to be called back. So far, no one has called me back. The bank transfer is urgent and I am completely stuck with a non existing customer service. The next step will be for me to close my bank account.

Title: Highly unprofessional and disrespectful bank
Reply: No Reply
Experience: Highly unprofessional and disrespectful bankI am a client of Boursorama bank since June 2019, and I have recently applied to open LIVRET A for my two sons (one who was born in France, and other who was born in Pakistan). During the submission process, I was asked to upload the birth certificates which I did. For the one born in France, there was no issue as it was a birth certificate issued in France. However, for other, I received the following email with following point- l'acte de naissance est incomplet, la date et le lieu de naissance des parents sont absents du document. merci de nous faire parvenir une copie complète du livret de famille ou une copie complète de l'acte de naissance avec filiation de Muhammad et une copie du passeport du représentant légalThe issue is that the birth certificates issued in Pakistan have only the names of Parents and do not have dates and places of birth of Parents. Given that in Pakistan a document similar to livret famille does not exist, I have always provided this certificate to receive official documents for my son (Prefecture, Impots, etc) and have never faced an issue. However, to address this problem, I provided (parents) marriage certificate, our titre de sejour, our passports, etc to provide the proof and date of birth of parents. Given that, i am an existing client (and Boursorama has all my information) I did hope that this info will be fine. However, to my surprise, two days later I received a refusal for an account opening for my elder son. Anyways, I got a pseudo livret famille from the Embassy of Pakistan in Paris and reapplied. Again in a couple of days, i got a refusal.This whole episode is very strange for me. Because I do not understand why a DISCRIMINATION is being applied to one child and there is no issue for the other. Is it only because one has a birth certificate issued by a Town Hall in France while the other holds a birth certificate from Pakistan? Just to let you know the same birth certificate was accepted also by the ministry of interior of France. Therefore, i seriously wonder, if a document that is accepted all over, a bank is not willing to consider (and despite all extra parent-related information that was provided)Getting Livret A is not rocket science and i can get it with any bank (My other account is with BNP Paribas and they are after my life to get these plans for my children). After that i tried reaching out to multiple departments but all in vain. Yesterday, I received a letter from one Mr MEZARD. It is amazing how much attention is given to the details because the letter mentioned the reason as - application de nos conditions generals - but did not have the courtesy to specify what precisely is the CONDITION we did not fulfill. But that is because there is NO REAL CONDITION. It is just profile discrimination (possibly racism?) given that there are different documents (the one that had a French birth certificate had the account open vs. the other child having a foreign document). Anyways I have initiated the account opening with BNP Parisbas (Thank god they have the brains to relate). Of course, I will contact Banque de France but to launch a full-scale complaint and audit of the processes. I am also progressing with closure of my account and my suggestion to everyone will be to STAY AWAY from such a discorteous and disrecpectful bank with a useless customer service

Title: The worst bank I have ever worked with

Experience: The worst bank I have ever worked withThe worst bank I have ever worked with.  They are unreachable. They allow you to sign up for appointments and then they don’t honor them (3 in a row for us), don’t answer emails, don’t respond by telephone, don’t permit you to make transfers, and are blocking our nearly 8000 euros. This is not a business bank. It’s clearly a scam.

Title: Everything was great until you sign up
Reply: Hi Michael, We appreciate your initial positive review and we're truly sorry to hear about your recent experiences with our services. We understand the importance of the work your association is doing to support those affected by rare diseases in Ukraine during these challenging times, and we apologize for any inconvenience you've encountered.Our goal is to provide a reliable and efficient banking experience, and it's disheartening to hear that we've fallen short of your expectations. We understand that you've encountered difficulties with international transfers outside the SEPA region. We acknowledge that this limitation can be frustrating, and we're actively exploring ways to expand our international transfer options to better serve our diverse customer base.We apologize for the inconvenience you've faced with the disabled cheque features. While cheques have become less common in today's digital banking landscape, we recognize that they still hold value in certain situations. We will review the possibility of reinstating this feature or providing an alternative solution.Thank you for bringing these issues to our attention, and we hope to have the opportunity to regain your trust in the future.Sincerely, Barbara - Anytime
Experience: Everything was great until you sign upI initially gave a good review to anytime as they were great when we set up the account, which is for a new association. Our association raises money for people with rare diseases in Ukraine impacted by the war.  Now that it's time to send the money to the beneficiaries, we're told that you can only make transfers to SEPA countries with an IBAN number. Even countries outside of SEPA who have affiliated banks in the EU are no good because anytime won't let you make transfers using Swift anymore.  Since joining they have also completely disabled features to get or send cheques. (This may seem like not a big deal, until someone wants to make you a donation).  When you ask for help you get annoying AI generated responses inviting you to 'find another solution' but 'rest assured, you can still make a transfer via iban in SEPA.'  This account is very expensive for what it is. It's basically a scam. They understood where and how I wanted to send transfers when i set up the account and now there is literally nothing I can do except send the money to my personal account-so what's the point. Traditional French banks are slower and they don't like to open small association accounts so they will try to put you off, but honestly it's worth the hassle because this 'bank' really is not fit for purpose.

Title: This was one of the most bizarre…
Reply: Bonjour, Merci d'avoir pris le temps de partager votre expérience même si celle-ci est négative. Après vérification, je constate que l'ouverture de votre compte Anytime a été réalisée en 4 jours. Nous aurions pu ouvrir le compte plus rapidement, seulement comme indiqué dans le premier échange avec nos services nous demandons que la vérification de votre identité par caméra soit effectuée. Celle-ci ayant été réalisée le 26 mai, nous avons pu procéder à l'ouverture de votre compte le jour même 😊De plus, afin d'être certains de correspondre à vos besoins, nous prenons toujours contact avec nos clients lors de leur souscription. Durant cet échange, nous nous informons sur votre activité et donnons toutes les informations nécessaires au sujet de la gestion de votre compte. Concernant les chèques, le délai d'encaissement est effectivement de 5 semaines en moyenne, à réception de votre courrier à notre centre de traitement. Si ce délai peut paraître un peu long, il est néanmoins nécessaire pour nous de s'assurer que votre chèque soit bien en règle, c'est-à-dire bien provisionné et non déclaré perdu ou volé. Nous avons l'obligation de vérifier la validité du chèque auprès de tous les acteurs impliqués dans cette opération. Cette procédure permet d'éviter des frais de rejet importants pour vous mais aussi pour Anytime. Si nous ne faisons pas cela, que peut-il se passer ? Prenons l'exemple d'une situation où nous créditerions immédiatement votre chèque de 4.000€ dès sa réception. Vous dépensez cet argent dans la foulée.La banque de votre client le rejette tardivement, c'est-à-dire à la toute fin du délai de contestation de 11 jours. Anytime doit rendre à la banque le montant de 4.000€. De votre côté, vous n'avez plus l'argent sur votre compte et nous devons donc mettre en place une procédure administrative pour récupérer les fonds. Cette situation litigieuse, et ce malgré votre bonne foi, serait aussi désagréable pour vous que pour nous.Si ce délai ne convient pas à votre activité, ce que nous comprenons tout à fait, nous vous recommandons de privilégier les encaissements par carte bancaire via un lien de paiement (lien) ou par virements, afin de vous faire régler plus facilement et plus rapidement par vos clients.N'hésitez pas à nous contacter sur promisonrepond@anyti.me pour toutes vos questions, nous sommes à votre écoute. A très bientôt, Léa
Experience: This was one of the most bizarre…This was one of the most bizarre experiences I've ever had - and with a bitter surprise at the end. The process of setting up the account is strangely quite long and complicated, it's done in three phases and takes a few days (a week?). The last stage is an interview on the phone with somebody who is very nosy and basically wants to know where your money is...But the cherry on top is cashing a chèque - it takes, please do sit down - 5 weeks! First I thought I'm reading it wrong and its 5 days but no, 5 bloody weeks. No way I'm staying. I read the terms and conditions before I started filling up the application forms and I read them again today, there is, obviously, no mention of this in the T&Cs, only when you first long on that they drop it on you. Neat. Plus the website keeps freezing, strange, very strange outfit.

Bien entendu, si à la suite de ces recherches il s'avère qu'il s'agit d'une erreur de notre part, votre compte sera débloqué au plus vite. De plus, en raison de la réglementation, nous ne sommes pas toujours en mesure de partager les raisons du blocage de votre compte, y compris avec les personnes titulaires des-dits comptes.Cordialement, Michèle - Anytime

Title: No communication for two months
Reply: Hi, We're sorry to hear that. Please be aware that Anytime is subject to regulatory requirements ⚖️ and our Compliance team must follow certain processes to ensure the safety of all our users.In fact, upon investigation, our team may block or close an account, without notice, in accordance with Article 6 of our TOS.In addition, we work with various partners and some of them may ask us to close accounts, in order to comply with the banking regulations in force, and this in accordance with the various framework contracts which bind you.Finally, we are registered with the ACPR in France and the BNB in Belgium, so we are obliged to follow the measures imposed by these state bodies.I know this is frustrating for you. Like every day, the reminder has already been made, we are waiting for a return after review of your file by our Compliance Department. Everything is being done on our side to ensure that you have full access to your account again.Your account is currently being treated by our client service. We will get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you for understanding. Kind regards, Barbara - Anytime

Title: Probably the worst bank I have ever used.
Reply: Bonjour, Merci d'avoir pris le temps de partager votre expérience même si celle-ci est négative. Je suis navrée de la situation rencontrée avec nos services. Nous vous confirmons avoir fait le nécessaire au sujet des différents points énoncés. Merci pour votre compréhension et votre confiance. A très bientôt, Léa
Experience: Probably the worst bank I have ever used.Honestly one of the worst banks ive ever dealt with. You log onto the website it says it has failed and the IT service are looking at it. It's been like this for months. You complete the capital deposit with them, which is actually a very good service, and in order to complete this deposit you have to sign up to the pro account. Once the account is set up you go onto the platform and have none of the pro features and they give you an option to pre-order the pro function. You call up the number they give you and it tells you to contact them through the site. It takes 3 days to hear anything back. Tried to make a transfer. Did not even recognise any of the 4 french IBAN I used. Tried to contact them but customer service is literally non-existent. I would recommend for the capital deposit but stay away from them if you are thinking of using them for banking.*Update since review* Anytime are quicker at getting back to you on trust pilot then they are on there own platform. If you want customer service just write a bad review, they will get back to you in a day. Since the review has been written they will not let me transfer money out of my account to close it. It sat pending for a week. When I asked them why it had not been sent they told me they didn't know. They called me back and told me the transfer would happen that day. The next day they email saying the transfer has been cancelled and to do it again. I did it again and I still havent had the transfer executed. They also tried to send me the card about 3 weeks after I had opened a pro account with them which failed even though a competitor bank sent me a brand new card next day to the same address. They claim they fixed the site. Issue is still blatantly there. Only when I write a bad review on trustpilot do they then provide me with the pro features that I paid for. Admission of guilt on their behalf. Tried to ask for a refund given that they had not given me the pro features, have not heard anything back in days. I just want do be done with anytime so I never have to have this experience as well but they wont let me leave. Last thing my accountant in France told me not to use anytime so clearly they don't have a good reputation. Be very careful about using them.

Title: Funds Missing in Action
Reply: Bonjour, Merci d'avoir pris le temps de poster votre avis. Nous ne laissons jamais nos clients avec une problématique non résolue.J'ai transmis votre dossier à une de mes collègues du Service Client. Elle m'a confirmé qu'elle allait le traiter en urgence et mettre tout en oeuvre pour vous apporter une solution efficace. Cordialement, Léa
Experience: Funds Missing in ActionI have been trying to hold off writing a review in this way, but my patience has run out.I set up an account with Anytime for my new French company. The aim, to buy a chalet and run it part as second home and part as business. The Anytime account was set up very quickly and efficiently. Obviously it would be, to get you on board.The first transaction was to be the property transaction, so I tested the account to ensure I could transfer funds in. I received my banking card. All looked good, efficient.I sent a message to the bank to inform them of the transaction and that they would be receiving 700,000 Euros, which I would then need to use to complete the transaction and develop the property. 30 hours later I get a message to say I can only send 10,000 Euros to the account, which can't have more than 50,000 in it. Too late, 30 hours is a long time and the funds have been transferred. This credit and transfer limit is a very material term. I still cannot see the terms and conditions that state it.8 days later, I still do not have the 700,000 Euros back, how crazy is that. The day for completion of the purchase has passed earlier this week. Signing has happened, but I have let the Sellers down. I have no way to access the funds, they are in the system.I keep asking for progress and providing all information requested. I may ask 5 to 10 questions in messages in a day. 48 hours at the earliest I get a reply to one question. The rest of the questions go unanswered. The Bank is faceless and you never get the same person answering messages. There is no conversation. You can't call.Banks have a duty of care to their customers. Duties around client monies are pretty high. These duties are simply not being respected at all.The Bank are saying that they are seeking to increase the credit and transfer limit. They know the urgency, but it has taken 6 days and still documents uploaded have not been looked at. When I ask if they can find the funds, they say it will be at least 7 days, but provide no rationale for this and no information on the funds. They have the transfer certificates, so they know they received it.This bank is set up for every day business. Anything not in the everyday mundane transactions will not work. They are unable to deal with specific requests, whether in chat, messages or on the telephone. They need to rework the model as all businesses have some extraordinary transactions.A faceless bank that shirks its responsibilities and hides behind the answers the internal systems give it.I hope they may right this and then prove me wrong, but I would be foolish to hold my breath.

Reply: Hello, Could you please give us a phone number or the email you used to register to your Anytime account ? We can't help you without any information.Regards, Anytime

This review relates to French version of the website. I shall be moving my account elsewhere.Thanks for the reply, shame you weren't a bit quicker dealing with my problems! I will still be closing my account. Just an update, since I first reviewed this disaster of a bank, they have failed to pay my social security contributions to URSSAF for the month of August, even though there was more than enough in the account to cover it. Customer service is a joke, not even worthy of the name.I will soon be moving my account to Crédit Agricole.

Title: One week to reply to a question,then a…
Reply: **CECI EST UN MESSAGE AUTOMATIQUE** Bonjour,Le commentaire que vous avez posté concerne une demande pour le Service Client.Pour obtenir une réponse rapide à votre problématique, nous vous invitons à vous connecter à votre Espace Client et à signaler votre problème. Notre équipe mettra alors tout en œuvre pour vous apporter une solution efficace rapidement.Si vous l’avez déjà signalé, le fait de passer par Trustpilot ne permettra malheureusement pas d’accélérer le processus. En effet, notre Service Client n’a plus connaissance des commentaires Trustpilot. Nous avons pris la décision de ne plus utiliser Trustpilot, de nous recentrer sur l’expérience de nos clients et donc sur leurs messages reçus via l’Espace Client et ce, pour plusieurs raisons :1/ 58,4% des commentaires négatifs postés concernent des comptes clôturés / en cours de clôture ou sont initiés par des personnes malveillantes. 2/ 95,3% des messages négatifs sont postés par des personnes pour lesquelles l’utilisation d’une néo banque est compliquée, le service n’étant pas adapté. Ils s’attendent à avoir un conseiller disponible par téléphone 24h/24h et ne sont pas à l’aise avec le « 100% digital ». 3/ 98,2% des messages négatifs, décrivent un problème qui aurait pu être évité si les utilisateurs avaient lu nos messages, nos FAQ et nos instructions.Tous ces types de messages induisent alors en erreur les internautes qui pourraient lire ces commentaires.Nous avons également décidé de mettre en place un système de notation, afin de nous permettre d’améliorer notre Service Client. En effet, lorsque nos clients se connectent à leur espace, ils ont alors la possibilité de nous noter. Notre note est aujourd’hui de 9,2/10 (vs 7,6/10 sur Trustpilot).  Une mauvaise note sur notre système est beaucoup plus alertant pour nous que sur Trustpilot.
Experience: One week to reply to a question,then a…One week to reply to a question,then a one word answer really not helpful.Still waiting for my next question to be answered and i have an account with them.If you are in england dont expect to pay your french bills with this account.(Update) i cant reply to your message below mine so i find it funny how you claim to not use trustpilot but you answered on here quicker than my question on your customer portal i,m still waiting for my answer i am an active account holder shall i screen shot your one worded answer to my first question on your customer portel?Ridicule le service client est vraiment mauvais, je les ai signalés

Une fois les documents vérifiés, nous vous communiquerons l'IBAN du notaire sur lesquels les associés devront effectuer les virements. Le notaire rédigera l'attestation de dépôt de capital.
